description: A helper header file providing utility functions for file content reading, property extraction from configuration files, file system checks, and pattern-based file searching within a C++ project. It includes functions for reading property values, reading entire file contents, checking if a path is a regular file, recursive directory search with wildcard patterns, and variable expansion within strings.
